hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $51+30$ then subtract $1$.

>$\begin{align}\greenD{51}+\purpleC{29}&=\greenD{51}+\purpleC{30}-\purpleC{1}\\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategies can be used to add $51+29$.**

- Add $51+30$ then subtract $1$.

- Add $50+30$.

question.content:
**Select any strategy that can be used to add $51+29$.**
